Pre-Game Insights: Scotland are looking to bounce back from September heartbreak in the Nations League after facing Croatia in Zagreb on Saturday. Steve Clarke's side were promoted to League A this term and suffered late defeats in their opening matches. They face a tough challenge against Croatia, who have shown signs of progress despite a transitional period.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be available to watch on YouTube via Viaplay International for free. Radio coverage will be available on BBC Radio Scotland.
